scripts.start: yarn eslint:fix && yarn build && node dist/app.js
scripts.docker:run: node -e "const { spawnSync } = require('child_process'); spawnSync('docker', ['run', '--rm', '-p', '8080:8080', '-v', process.cwd() + '/volumes/logs:/app/logs', 'labtrack-backend'], { stdio: 'inherit' });"
scripts.docker:mongo: node -r dotenv/config -e "const { spawnSync } = require('child_process'); spawnSync('docker', ['run', '-d', '--rm', '-p', '27017:27017', '-v', process.cwd() + '/volumes/data:/data/db', '--env-file', '.env', '--name', 'labtrack-mongodb', 'mongo'], { stdio: 'inherit' });"
